feed.title: Strait of Georgia - Marine Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: STRONG WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Strait of Georgia - north of Nanaimo
Forecast for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - Strait of Georgia - north of Nanaimo
entry.summary:
Wind southeast 10 to 20 knots increasing to southeast 20 to 25 this evening then diminishing to southeast 5 to 15 Wednesday morning. Wind diminishing to light Wednesday afternoon. Chance of showers beginning near noon changing to rain this evening then to chance of showers Wednesday.
Issued 10:30 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Extended Forecast - Strait of Georgia - north of Nanaimo
entry.summary:
Thursday: Wind variable 5 to 15 knots.
Friday: Wind northwest 5 to 15 knots increasing to northwest 15 to 25 late in the day.
Saturday: Wind northwest 15 to 25 knots.
Issued 04:00 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Forecast for Today Tonight and Wednesday. - Strait of Georgia - south of Nanaimo
entry.summary:
Wind light becoming northwest 10 knots this afternoon then increasing to easterly 10 to 15 this evening. Wind diminishing to light Wednesday afternoon. Chance of showers beginning early this afternoon changing to rain this evening then to chance of showers Wednesday.
Issued 10:30 AM PDT 12 June 2018

entry.title: Extended Forecast - Strait of Georgia - south of Nanaimo
entry.summary:
Thursday: Wind variable 5 to 15 knots.
Friday: Wind northwest 5 to 15 knots increasing to northwest 15 to 25 late in the day.
Saturday: Wind northwest 15 to 25 knots.
Issued 04:00 AM PDT 12 June 2018
